name: MyTVchain
description: MyTVchain is the new sports ecosystem for the meta generation, built on the Binance Smart Chain. CONCEPT We have created the world's first #Fan2Earn : a revolutionary concept that allows true fans to support their favorite athletes, and earn rewards for it. MYTVCHAIN FOR TRUE FANS : The only place where you can collect Legendary NFT of superstar athletes, watch the most thrilling sports competitions, play challenges and games, support athletes and earn rewards. All at the same time. MYTVCHAIN FOR ATHLETES : MyTVchain is the first blockchain platform based on a freemium model which empowers athletes to : - Own and monetize their content, generate additional income, while engaging with their fans without intermediaries. - Offers to their fans a never-seen-before sport digital experience.
